title: 500 ping
body:
Before any rioter decides to come and say that it's an internet problem on my side, i would like to explain that this only started happening recently. Not only that but around 75% of my friends have reported the same problem, internet goes down only for league and the rest remains working. I have friends with leaver busters, and some others who are afraid to get banned due to this.

I highly doubt that my friends and I suddenly got terrible net all at the same time. At least try to look into this problem, its been going on for a week and rioters keep giving the same response (which i already doubtfully tried, to no avail).

I have friends that have simply stopped playing until this problem is fixed...

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
That lag spike is really high, and if it's sudden then it could be packet loss or how your ISP is routing to us.  Your internet could be fine, but how your ISP is reaching the game server might be an issue.  Running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) can help determine that by giving an overview.  Toss me your results so we can confirm.

Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) as well and trace it to the EUW game server: 192.64.170.252.  Run it for about 5 minutes to see how you're routing to us, and let me know what you find.

This way of sharing my results of the log reader is a bit confusing, but i don't know any other way since i can't post pictures or share the site

Thanks!  It does look like you're getting some packet loss, and your ping starts to increase as soon as your router tries to reach your ISP.  It gets pretty worse from there, as your ISP seems to be getting some hiccups.  

Let's start off with the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your local settings for a smooth transition to your ISP.  This will help rule out any possibilities that your initial transition might be contributing to that packet loss.  Go over each step, test a custom game, and run traceroute again to see if things improve.

If the issue persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those logs so our tech team can work with you directly and get this resolved.
